tool.name: StructureCheck
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of the Structure Checking tool to generate summary checking results on a json file.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: features
param.label: features
param.help: Features to summarize. If None, all the features will be computed.
param.option: models - multiple molecules or coordinate sets in a single file
chains - multiple chains in a single file
altloc - atom alternative conformation given an alternate location indicator and occupancy
metals - metals present in the structure
ligands - heteroatoms present in the structure
chiral - to say that a structure is chiral is to say that its mirror image is not the same as it self
getss - detect SS bonds or disulfides

tool.help:
